activities:
•	All billing and client account information in paper form is secured in locked cabinets and only accessible by specific management and billing associates that require this information to perform daily job functions. 

•	All electronic billing and client account data is maintained in a password secured HTTPS environment.  

•	SolidSpace associates must gain consent from client before accessing client’s data or performing duties outside of previous maintenance or work agreements. 

•	A detailed log of work preformed is kept in the secure SolidSpace customer management system. 

•	All associates sign a Standards of Conduct policy, part of the SolidSpace Associates Handbook, before accessing any client information. This document outlines the company’s policy for handling client information and defines misuse of information.

•	SolidSpace takes appropriate measures to prevent security breaches of client’s account information and data seen by its associates. Including by not limited to:

•	Pre-employment screening
•	Ongoing performance reviews
•	Weekly support and management procedure meetings
•	Continual monitoring of internal document  storage environment
•	24/7 video monitoring of physical data center space
•	Limiting access to data center facility to only necessary associates and clients
•	Visitors accompanied by SolidSpace employee at all times
•	Biometric access system
•	Two door barrier to data center
•	Registration kiosk for all visitor
•	All kiosk and Biometric access logs are kept for 30 days
